subtitle: Visit daily to receive an exclusive reward

tips.2: Time to earn points and show support
tips.3: There are 2 types of points you can earn
tips.5: Points for visiting the app daily for 14 days. Visit each day and say hi, collect the maximum amount of points to be eligible for unique rewards
tips.7: Points for inviting friends, each invited friend will bring you +5 points, make it to the top 500 to get the maximum rewards
tips.8: If you are reading this, know that you are so early!!

notifications.copy_referral: You have copied the referral link.
